name: Nightmare (itch) (kMukabe)
description:
My terrible attempt at creating an rpg. Game created for My First Game Jam. It was my first time using rpg-maker and thus it's really rough around the edges. I plan to give it one small update after the jam is completed and call it a day.

Controls:

Arrow keys: Movement Z: Action button X/Esc: Menu

Update: Fixes a few bugs, others not so much. Added hidden fight. And halfed the download size.
